title: Panic on crowded Ukraine train - passenger describes moment of Russian drone strike
summary_full: The BBC speaks to a person who was aboard a train on which five people died after it was targeted by drones.
summary_public: The BBC speaks to a person who was aboard a train on which five people died after it was targeted by drones.
